Blackschenko: The Gorski Claster will attract 1.3 million tourists to Petersburg for a year.
The future tourist cluster of the Goranski will be able to attract 1.3 million guests during the year, and the Prime Minister of the Russian Federation made a statement.Dmitri Chernaschenko♪

Director General of the GroupAircraft♪ Anton Elystrates intends to leave his post. This "Friend Petersburg" was unofficially reported by a source close to the company.

In Petersburg, since the beginning of the year, the "Ladas" and "UAZ Patriot" have been the most expensive.
In Petersburg, in January, the most expensive cars were the new Patiot SUA and the Ladas.
17:51, 09 February 2024♪

The Russian Simens unit was renamed "Systems."
The Russian structure AG Siemens - the Simens GS - changed the name. Now it's called "Sistems."
16:56, 09 February 2024♪

Trade
Estonia lost Euro1.7 billion to stop imports from Russia
Estonia ' s trade declined sharply in 2023: Estonian exports fell by 16 per cent, imports to the country by 17 per cent.
15:55, 09 February 2024♪
dp.ru

The Cantemirov Street ended the demolition of the former Corps of the Climov plant.
In Petersburg, the dismantling of former production units at the Klimov plant on Cantemirov Street, 11.
15:20, 09 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Consumer market
In 2023, half of the expenses of the Rossian in the offline came to shops and hospital.
As a result of 2023, the Rossians made 8 per cent more purchases in all segments of the retail offline business than a year earlier, counted the Tinykoff Business analysts.
15:03, 09 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Finland
In Finland, it was allowed to close the border with the Russian Federation for a longer period.
Measures to close the border with Russia, which may be deemed necessary, may be longer than previously stated by the Chancellor of Justice of Tuomas Peusty.
12:14, 09 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Patent disputes
The Petersburg plant ran into a patent troll from Ufa.
The Intellectual Rights Court (IPR) has taken action against an individual entrepreneur from Ufah Azamat Ibatullin, requesting an early termination of the security of the trademark (TZ) Prospect for two classes of the International Classification of Goods and Services - 35 M (equivalent through intermediaries) and 42m (realization of goods). The reason is the non-use of this brand by the Pieterburg O.O. "HC "Pigment" , which produces a wide range of paint products. Under the trademark Prospect, the company sells paint for road markings.
09:52, 09 February 2024♪
Dimitri Marakulin
Finance
The Lising Company from Petersburg will issue 500 million roubles bonds
Now Mosbierge is trading three bond issues. "Rodeline" for 1.25 billion roubles previously dispersed. The closest is repaid in November 2027, two others in only 2028.
09:44, 09 February 2024♪
Eugenia Petrov
Culture
"Master and Margarita" film was produced by a puror in a procate:

Tihyi Don (1957-1958, director Sergei Herasimov)

0600, 09 February 2024♪
Natalia Efendiev
Corporate culture
Employers began to give less gifts on 23 February and 8 March
Last year, 27 percent of the companies gave gifts to their employees and their children, told the AP at the Alpha Lising. According to the study, the estimated value of one corporate gift is between 500 and 200 roubles. If you count all the holidays in a year, the average check per staff member is 12,000 roubles.
0600, 09 February 2024♪
Alina Kisyakova
Internet
The fines will come to everyone: bloggers still ignore the Internet Reclams.
In 2023, the Edinary Internet Reclama system accounted for 28 billion creativity, 1.2 million advertisers and 73,000 promotion sites, counted in the Roskonnadzor. According to RIP, the total value of the payment chains (the mediator intermediaries) in 2023 was 581.3 billion roubles.
0600, 09 February 2024♪
Alina Kisyakova
Interview Putin Carlson
Tucker Carlson posted an interview with Vladimir Putin on his website.
American journalist Tucker CarlsonpublishedAn interview with the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin. The recording of the conversation was posted on the website the night of 9 February.tuckercarlson.com♪
01:59, 09 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Medicine
Doctor city: under Petersburg, they built a clinic for 100,000 patients a year.
The Centre consists of a children ' s diagnostic clinic, a radiological diagnosis and rehabilitation unit, an operating unit and auxiliary recovery rooms for adults and children, a permanent emergency medical unit, an oncots centre and many others. On Thursday, 8 February, a new clinic was visited by the President of the Federation Council, Valentine Matvienko, the Governor of Leblasty, Alexander Drozdenko, Head of Petersburg, Alexander Beglov, and the Plenipotentiary Representative of the President of the Russian Federation to the SLF, Alexander Gutzan.
01:16, 09 February 2024♪
Tatiana
Energy
The villagers in Lenoblastai were out of electricity in the freeze.
In the afternoon of 6 February, the villagers of Semrino Gatshin district of Leningrad province discovered that the Rosséti Lenengergo PAO was scheduled to work on the replacement of power lines from 7 to 9 and from 12 to 16 February, and that the power supply of the local post would be temporarily stopped. The villagers met this news of anger. It is not enough that the electrical power cuts of up to 8.5 hours per day were to occur in mid-February, as well as on those dates, synoptics predict that freezes should come to the area.
00:45, 09 February 2024♪
Ilya Slove
Tourism
Visitors are waiting: Petersburg dreams of an explosion of Chinese turpot.
Following the lifting of the covid restrictions in Podnebes, Russian turbines placed great hopes for the 2023 season. I'm sorry, they didn't. The Chinese have come, but not enough to compensate for the fall that has been under way for years.
00:31, 09 February 2024♪
Darya Dimitrieva

info.title: Blackschenko: The Gorski Claster will attract 1.3 million tourists to Petersburg for a year.
info.short_text: The future tourist cluster of the Goranski will be able to attract 1.3 million guests during the year, and the Prime Minister of the Russian Federation, Dmitri Chernashenko, has been warned.

info.title: Sberbank lowered the price of the Jun bidding by 40%.
info.short_text: Sberbank lowered more than 40 per cent of the amount for which TRA Yun would sell.

info.title: The North Worth was headed by a former top manager of "Kalashnikov" and "Rosnano."
info.short_text: The Board of Directors of the Peterburg Shipping Plant, North Worf (included to the SKO), replaced the Director General of the Enterprise. Mikhail Nenukov has been appointed.

info.title: Hendirector developer Anton Elystov will leave his post.
info.short_text: Anton Elystrates, Director General of the Samolet Group, intends to leave his post. This "Friend Petersburg" was unofficially reported by a source close to the company.

info.title: President, HeadHunter Mikhail Zuk
info.short_text: The president of the company, HeadHunter Michael Zhukov, died. His colleagues reported it.

info.title: In Petersburg, since the beginning of the year, the "Ladas" and "UAZ Patriot" have been the most expensive.
info.short_text: In Petersburg, in January, the most expensive cars were the new Patiot SUA and the Ladas.

info.title: The Russian Simens unit was renamed "Systems."
info.short_text: The Russian structure AG Siemens - the Simens GS - changed the name. Now it's called "Sistems."

info.title: Estonia lost Euro1.7 billion to stop imports from Russia
info.short_text: Estonia ' s trade declined sharply in 2023: Estonian exports fell by 16 per cent, imports to the country by 17 per cent.

info.title: The Cantemirov Street ended the demolition of the former Corps of the Climov plant.
info.short_text: In Petersburg, the dismantling of former production units at the Klimov plant on Cantemirov Street, 11.

info.short_text: As a result of 2023, the Rossians made 8 per cent more purchases in all segments of the retail offline business than a year earlier, counted the Tinykoff Business analysts.

info.short_text: Measures to close the border with Russia, which may be deemed necessary, may be longer than previously stated by the Chancellor of Justice of Tuomas Peusty.

The reason is the non-use of this brand by the Pieterburg O.O. "HC "Pigment" , which produces a wide range of paint products. Under the trademark Prospect, the company sells paint for road markings.

info.short_text: Now Mosbierge is trading three editions of the Rodeline bonds by 1.25 billion roubles previously dispersed. The closest is repaid in November 2027, two others in only 2028.

info.short_text: Last year, 27 percent of the companies gave gifts to their employees and their children, told the AP at the Alpha Lising. According to the study, the estimated value of one corporate gift is between 500 and 200 roubles. If you count all the holidays in a year, the average check per staff member is 12,000 roubles.

info.title: The fines will come to everyone: bloggers still ignore the Internet Reclams.
info.short_text: In 2023, the Edinary Internet Reclama system accounted for 28 billion creativity, 1.2 million advertisers and 73,000 promotion sites, counted in the Roskonnadzor. According to RIP, the total value of the payment chains (the mediator intermediaries) in 2023 was 581.3 billion roubles.

info.title: Tucker Carlson posted an interview with Vladimir Putin on his website.
info.short_text: American journalist Tucker Carlson published an interview with Russian President Vladimir Putin. The recording of the conversation was posted on the night of 9 February on the tuckercarlson.com website.

info.title: Doctor city: under Petersburg, they built a clinic for 100,000 patients a year.
info.short_text: The Centre consists of a children ' s diagnostic clinic, a radiological diagnosis and rehabilitation unit, an operating unit and auxiliary recovery rooms for adults and children, a permanent emergency medical unit, an oncots centre and many others. On Thursday, 8 February, a new clinic was visited by the President of the Federation Council, Valentine Matvienko, the Governor of Leblasty, Alexander Drozdenko, Head of Petersburg, Alexander Beglov, and the Plenipotentiary Representative of the President of the Russian Federation to the SLF, Alexander Gutzan.

info.title: The villagers in Lenoblastai were out of electricity in the freeze.
info.short_text: In the afternoon of 6 February, the villagers of Semrino Gatshin district of Leningrad province discovered that the Rosséti Lenengergo PAO was scheduled to work on the replacement of power lines from 7 to 9 and from 12 to 16 February, and that the power supply of the local post would be temporarily stopped. The villagers met this news of anger. It is not enough that the electrical power cuts of up to 8.5 hours per day were to occur in mid-February, as well as on those dates, synoptics predict that freezes should come to the area.

info.title: Visitors are waiting: Petersburg dreams of an explosion of Chinese turpot.
info.short_text: Following the lifting of the covid restrictions in Podnebes, Russian turbines placed great hopes for the 2023 season. I'm sorry, they didn't. The Chinese have come, but not enough to compensate for the fall that has been under way for years.
